ValidationRule.description: Security value must be positive if Security Type in (Bank Guarantee, Security Lodged Deposit) otherwise Security Value must be negative
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (Security_Value__c > 0), OR( ISPICKVAL( Type__c , 'Security Refund Deposit'), ISPICKVAL( Type__c , 'Security Debt Transfer') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please correct security value. It should be negative amount. (e.g. - 100)
